$$ 
H(s) = \frac{s + 9}{s^2 + 10s + 2} = \frac{(s+9)}{(s+\sqrt{23}+5)(s-\sqrt{23}+5)}
$$

```{r, echo = FALSE,out.width=c('50%', '50%'), fig.show='hold'}
expr <- function(s) (s+9)/(s^2+10*s+2)
x_zero <- c(-9)
y_zero <- c(0)
x_pole <- c(-sqrt(23)+5,sqrt(23)-5)
y_pole <- c(0,0)
pole_zero_plot(x_zero, y_zero, x_pole, y_pole,10,expr)

```
